original: 蜀郡成都人，初仕劉璋，後為蜀漢官員。蜀漢大學者譙周曾求學於杜瓊。杜瓊擅長於星象占星，但鮮少發表議論，蔣琬、費禕都很器重他。
text: A native of Chengdu, Shu County, first served as Liu Zhang, then an official of the Shu Han Dynasty. Qiao Zhou from Shuhan University studied at Du Qiong. Du Qiong is good at astrological astrology, but rarely makes any comments. Jiang Wan and Fei Yi both value him.
